fields.name: Inspiration:
fields.value:
Peasants
Attack: None (Unstoppable)
Defense: Basic Auto-Vest

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, you receive three town targets. If a target dies, their place is taken by a random player. You know your targets.
- When all of your targets visit you on the same night, they are eaten alive by the Great Many-Mouthed One and die.
- If there are less than 3 Town players alive, you are eaten by the Great Many-Mouthed One and die.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak faction.**__
